document_data.name: Tymora's Holy Hall of Good Fortune and Casino
document_data.mainbody: '''Tymora's Holy Hall of Good Fortune and Casino''' was a gambling establishment located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction. The hall also served as a shrine to [[Tymora]], the goddess of luck.
document_data.Location: The casino was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in the section of the city located on the south bank of the [[River Tesh]]. It was located near the center of the quarter along [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Activities:
Rare among the various gambling dens of Zhentil Keep, Tymora's Holy Hall of Good Fortune and Casino always played fair. The business did not extend any lines of credit and any payouts were usually modest.

Lucklady [[Demetria Fortunato]] ran the temple and casino as of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Defenses: The temple was warded with protective [[spell]]s including ''[[protection from evil]]'' and ''[[protection from undead]]''. A [[werebear]] named [[Graddis]] monitored the halls for security.
